mil7.2.9:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘vayasassa dve angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani dve angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.2.9:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena asankitaparisankitena yattapayattena upatthitaya satiya samvutehi indriyehi caritabbam.
mil7.2.9:1.4: Idam, maharaja, vayasassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.2.9:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, vayaso yam kinci bhojanam disva natihi samvibhajitva bhunjati;
mil7.2.9:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena ye te labha dhammika dhammaladdha antamaso pattapariyapannamattampi, tatharupehi labhehi pativibhattabhogina bhavitabbam silavantehi sabrahmacarihi.
mil7.2.9:2.3: Idam, maharaja, vayasassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
